column1: missing you (i want to love you)
column2: Oh! My darlin. I miss you so much. I can't forget you. Because you are my world. You are mine. And I know you'll be. But why are you so far away from me. I want to tell you how I love you. I want to kiss you and say "I need you". I'm lost by myself. This distance will make that I love you (so much more). There is nothing here larger than my love. Tell me that you will love me forever. I know I can't breathe. Tell me that you'll be with me. I want to tell you how I love you. I want to kiss you. How I miss you. I want to thank you for you loving me. I want to love you and tell you that I need you here
